gridData.name: height
gridData.description: Height of item selector

gridData.name: http-url
gridData.description: REST url for fetching datasource.

gridData.name: http-method
gridData.description: Type of HTTP call, POST,GET.

gridData.name: enable-drag
gridData.description: Nodes can be dragged.

gridData.name: enable-drop
gridData.description: Any node can be dropped in the item selector structure.

gridData.name: across-itemselector
gridData.description: If across-itemselector is true then only the data transfer from itemselector to external panel

gridData.name: display-field
gridData.description: Name of key inside response data to display on ui.

gridData.name: value-field
gridData.description: Name of key inside response data.use to send to backend

gridData.name: data-reader
gridData.description: Key in JSON datasource for records

gridData.name: data
gridData.description: Local data for item selectors.

gridData.name: selectedRecords
gridData.description: Get selected value Object.

gridData.name: availableRecords
gridData.description: Get available values objects..

gridData.name: onDrag
gridData.description: Emits node data when node is dragged.

gridData.name: Right Arrow
gridData.description: On right click of item selector elements get selected and moves to next item selector panel.

gridData.name: Left Arrow
gridData.description: On left click of item selector elements get selected and moves to pervious item selector panel.

gridData.name: Up Arrow
gridData.description: On Up Arrow click navigates from current to previous item.

gridData.name: Down Arrow
gridData.description: On Down Arrow click navigates from current to next item.

gridData.name: Enter
gridData.description: On enter click elements get selected inside item selector.

gridData.name: Home
gridData.description: On click of Home will move element to first element.

gridData.name: End
gridData.description: On click of End will move element to last element.
